attributes.action: Stop Deducting War Pensions From Ex Servicemen who can't work and are on ESA
attributes.additional_details:
Stop deducting all by the first £10 of ex servicemen's
War Pension if they are receiving ESA it is a scandal those servicemen are given it for injuries sustained whilst in the forces.
Some are Hero,s to take away part of there compensation some fought for by the Royal British Legion to make sure they are looked after if they get worse it's not worth claiming for as it will be deducted
Young men badly injured fighting for there country or injured whilst in service
